sentence: Moving on to the topic of Madison Cawthorn, Republican Sen. Thom Tillis announced that he would be endorsing state Sen. Chuck Edwards, who is running against Cawthorn in the May 17 GOP primary.
title: Highlights from The Downballot: House Majority PAC and Democrats fight to hold Congress
